name: gallery prison
description:
Gallery Prison is an art gallery you can never leave. 

I created this game during a game jam with ąяţǥąʍ€$, called "Data Mutations". We all created some assets, shared them, and each of us created something using that pool of material. For more information, check out our super cool website.
